author: mharrend
body:
The source code of MadGraph5_aMC@NLO is needed for the upcoming version of Herwig++ 3 since Herwig++ 3 will directly use the LO ME from MG5_aMC@NLO via its own interface.

After consultation with Josh I have provided a MG5_aMC@NLO package which can also be used standalone. For this purpose, I have adjusted the MG5_aMC@NLO standard configuration file. However, this standalone mode will not be used by default, it is only a by-product.
title: Add MadGraph5_aMC@NLO as external package
